title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 26 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 26 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: Liberal cries to "Defund the Police" has led to a major crime wave across all major cities. Detroit residents are far more worried about public safety than police reform. D.C. police chief at shooting scene: "You cannot coddle violent criminals." The Biden administration is counting on covid to distract from its many failures. Covid-infected flood across the southern border. Over 2 million illegals, equivalent to the size of Chicago, are estimated to cross in 2021. The city of Dallas has lost its mind. Dallas Justice Now asking white allies to leave spots open for students of color at Ivy League, other top-50 schools. Tone-deaf Texas Democrats requesting their fans send them care packages: Dr. Pepper, salsa, hard candy and, of course, money!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
